chart.title: Government health expenditure as a share of GDP
chart.subtitle: This metric captures spending on government funded health care systems and social health insurance, as well as compulsory health insurance.
chart.note: Health spending includes final consumption of health care goods and services (i.e. current health expenditure). This excludes spending on capital investments.
chart.citation: Our World In Data based on Lindert (1994), OECD (1993), OECD Stat

public_health_expenditure_pc_gdp.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
